Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt01_npc0
Reply.text: Sanzoku-tachi wa haji o sukkari ushinatta nodesu! Karera wa marude jibun no sooko ni iku ka no yoo ni watashitachi no ryoodo o shuugeki shimasu.
